text: For vileins sinful dedes make a cherl.°
Poverte is hateful good, and, as I gesse
And be to yow a trewe° humble wif
Housbondes meke, yonge, and fresshe abedde
Was a ful worthy gentil° werreyour,°
Ye founden first this litel narwe clifte;
On her he caste° his hevy deedly yën
“And now, ye wrecched jelous fadres° oure,°
And lik to been° a veray gentil° man;
With al this newe lusty° folk of Troye.
An hunting° wol this lusty° fresshe° quene;
So priketh° her this newe joly wo.
The faire yonge Isiphilee, the shene,°
Sad,° wis, and trewe, of wordes avisee,°
And he was wis, hardy,° secree,° and riche.

And he was wis, hardy,° secree,° and riche.

text: And many another noble worthy dede

And wered upon my gaye scarlet gites.°
And me of olde Roman gestes° teche

¶Heer may men seen an humble wis accord;

Yong, strong, right vertuous, and riche and wis
Save only wrecche° Aurelius, allas!
Into hir owne derke regioun

Of thilke° parfit glorious pilgrimage
“O olde unholsom and mislived man

That God shuld han no parfit cleer witinge

Dwel rather here, min owene swete herte!
“For which, with humble, trewe, and pitous herte

And art my feithful lige man ybore;

For out of doute this olde povre man
